title: Get notification "messages working in the background" then no msg info happened several times? ??
content:
1. Periodic replies from non requests.
2. Getting notification saying "Messages is working in the background" messages typically later return as failed and the error remains. Upon trying to access the latest message conversation it will only return a blank screen. Is a critical and ongoing issue. Have reset, default settings selected and it persists. 3-4 months ongoing.
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 4
